The Samsung struggles a bit darker scenes, but this is natural for most LCD's. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase, and it proves that research and a quality name like Samsung is worth the extra buck. So far no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great TV-Good buy
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I've had this television for about a month now. I haven't had any problems with it at all. I received the tv about 4 or 5 days after I bought it....fast service! The best way to handle the shipping is to track your package and when it gets to its destination, call Eagle shipping and schedule an appointment for delivery. They will call you if you wait, but you will get faster service this way.No complaints! Great with Xbox 360, has a special game mode that makes the games rock! I suggest getting a DVD upconverter for movies.The sound is great for my bedroom and the size is perfect as well. This tv is 300 dollars more if you buy it at Best Buy or Circuit City. Buy it here at Amazon and save money, especially with the free shipping!Overall, great purchase and I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: wonderful!
Reviews.Author: D. Fritsch "amazon believer"
Reviews.Content: I did so much research before I ordered this television and, boy, it was really worth every second! The picture is great, the colors are fabulous, and with HD cable and an HDMI cable, it seems like we are part of the picture. When I ordered the tv, it was a week before the SuperBowl. So, when they said that it would take 2 weeks for delivery, I did not doubt it. Before I even had a chance to check to see whether delivery was scheduled, the shipping company was already calling to offer a delivery date. Super service since it was a whole week early! And, at $300.00 better than even Best Buy! Would buy from Amazon again in a heartbeat. And, probably will for the 40" - we are spoiled now!

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: K. O'connor
Reviews.Content: This TV was recommended to me by a co-worker who had recently purchased it. I already had a 20" Magnavox LCD TV that I purchased from a major discount retailer and wanted to upgrade. I'm a dedicated on-line shopper and found the best price on Amazon.com. I paid $[...] with free shipping. That was [...]dollars cheaper that any local electronics store in my area. The 4000:1 contrast ratio is beyond description! I see things that I never saw before. I also purchased an upscaling DVD player that uses an HDMI cable. The DVDs are amazing at [...]. This TV can really deliver and has the necessary connections for high definition. My friends call this TV "sexy" because of its sleek black gloss design. The cabinet seems to disappear in low light. Auto set up was simple and remote easy to operate. Few things in life exceed expectations--this product is one of them.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant and Dazzling Picture
Reviews.Author: gobirds2
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LNS3251D 32" Wide LCD HDTV with Integrated ATSC Tuner delivers a brilliant and dazzling picture. The picture contrast, colors and detail were excellent. I was very impressed when my friend showed me this set. This is an outstanding set and surpassed everything I anticipated before I actually got to see it. The picture is unbelievably sharp and crisp. I highly recommend this set. Samsung's technology has come a long way over the past 6 years compared to their sets I looked at back then. They are a front runner and leader in the LCD HD TV market.

Reviews.Title: Purchase of 32" Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Chapnick
Reviews.Content: This was an effecient and simple way to buy a television.  I knew what I wanted, so it was only a matter of minutes on-line making the purchase.  The set arrived in Orlando at the earlier part of the promised delivery window, and the actual physical delivery to my home was on time.Less than a month after my purchase I repeated the process for a 40" model of the same set.  There is nothing like repeat business to tell a service business that they are on track.

Reviews.Title: Perfect bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Sgt_Fishhead
Reviews.Content: Execellent TV for small to medium bedroom.  Used primarily with Dish DVR system using antenna/cable connection.  Great picture when viewed at distance of 8-10 feet away for majority of most channels.  Would be better with s-video cable.  Also bought an OPPO 970 upconverting DVD player at same time.  The OPPO gives the absolute best picture at 720P and probably would rival any true HD picture.  OPPO also includes the necessary HDMI cable.  Great combo for Disney/ Pixar movies.Con- The piano black finish is very nice and gives the TV an elegant air, but attracts dust.  Fortunately Samsung provides a cleaning cloth and the TV is easy to wipe down.  The remote also does not have back lit buttons.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG BEST LCD FOR THE MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Reinberg "Nextel GUY"
Reviews.Content: I PLACED THE ORDER FROM AMAZON ON THE 22ND OF DEC, HOOKED UP MY NEW LCD ON THE 29TH, NO PROBLEMS AT ALL WITH EGL DELIVERY, AMAZING HIGH DEFINITION PICTURE, MY FRIEND HAS A SONY 32XBR2, PAID OVER $1800 FOR HIS, MY PICTURE IS JUST AS GOOD IF NOT BETTER WITH THE 4000:1 CONTRAST RATIO, GOT A SWEET DEAL ON THIS ONE FROM AMAZON, DID ALOT OF RESEARCH ON DIFFERENT LCD SCREENS, FOR THE MONEY THIS LCD HAS THE SHARPEST,BRIGHTEST DISPLAY, BETTER THEN PANASONIC, AND JUST AS GOOD IF NOT BETTER THEN A SONY BRAVIA, DO NOT HESITATE BUY THIS ONE AND ENJOY THE AMAZING PICTURE,

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Madmax
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung TV purchased through Amazon. The picture is superb; connection and hook up of the TV is very simple and straight forward. I had no difficulty or problems with Eagle Shipping (as I have read other had). I think the key is to communicate with them on a specific delivery time and date; they were at my house when they said they would be.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Television
Reviews.Author: A. Chianese
Reviews.Content: The LNS3251D is simply a fantastic buy at around $1,000. Only a more expensive Sony could possibly best this television.If you're looking for a leading-edge, top of the line TV, this is the one to get. You don't need increased contrast like the higher end Samsungs; this one is deep and dark enough to please even the most critical eyes. Keep in mind that besides adjusting contrast and brightness, this set has an "E Saving" mode which will dim the back light considerably. This enhances contrast a GREAT deal. And with the two HDMI inputs, you're set for cable/sat. box with HDMI connectivity and a high-definition DVD player when they're affordable.I used to sell televisions (up to about a year and a half ago) and on my way out I noticed how amazing the Samsung LCDs were becoming. Now, with these current models, they really go toe-to-toe with the Sony Bravia XBR models. And you can't beat that, I'm pretty sure of that. The Samsung is not only the most physically attractive TV but it simply provides the best picture for the size and price point. The piano black is beautiful, the connectivity is perfect, the remote is user-friendly, and the settings are diverse enough to get the picture just the way you'd like it.Amazon also seems to continually have the lowest price on this TV and shipping from Eagle is great. They make sure the screen is not damaged before leaving and they're very polite. That's saying a LOT for any delivery team. I do recommend CALLING them as soon as you track the item as being in your state. You can probably set up delivery for 1-3 days from that point, but if you wait for them to deliver on their own, it will take longer. They seem to prioritize the deliveries setup over the phone.So again, if you're still deciding on a TV, this is the ONE to get. Keep in mind that out of the box, any LCD tv needs some proper adjusting. I've dimmed the back light to the "medium" setting and played with the brightness/contrast/color to the point where the pictures look perfect and represent colors properly. You can pick yourself up (or even rent) a calibration DVD to simplify this task.ONE con about this TV is the sound, as many others have mentioned. It is poor. Very poor. I have it hooked up to a surround sound system in my bedroom anyway, so if you're planning on using the TV's speakers, don't be surprised by the muffled sound. Samsung still hasn't gotten that right yet, but I don't care about that - the picture is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LCD TV
Reviews.Author: R. Nelson
Reviews.Content: First of all, let me confirm that this is a great TV. There are plenty on the market at low prices but you will get what you pay for. With 4000:1 contrast ratio, the blacks and whites on this Samsung are vibrant as well as all the colors in between. I'm waiting for my Direct TV to be installed with the HD package...then it will really shine. Currently on regular cable and picture is very good but not exceptional. DVD's really look great. Worth the extra cost over those price point LCD TV's...and still saved close to $300 over Circuit City.Now, about Eagle Global Logistics.....I ordered on Dec. 4th...shipped from Reno on the 6th and arrived at local EGL terminal (3 miles from my house) on the 9th. Wasn't delivered until the 14th (tracking info from Amazon had the 15th to the 19th as predicted delivery dates)but that was OK. I was under the impression from other reviews that EGL would unpack, help setup and confirm that TV was OK before leaving. My delivery guys told me that this was NOT in Amazon contract...simply inside delivery, unpack and take box/trash PLUS they are not supposed to be at delivery site more then 5 minutes. I had prepared my entertainment center, viewed manual online (so I was prepared to quickly assemble base) and had set plugged in and on cable in a few minutes...confirming all was OK before signing manifest. Terminal allows customer pick-ups but once manifest is signed, it's your problem if set is defective. Be prepared to move quickly when EGL delivers or they may not stick around long enough to let you check out set. Otherwise I'm quick pleased with 10 days from order date to delivery. The price was great, free shipping, no tax.....can it be any better then that!!

Reviews.Title: Great experience!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Bootski "Kathy"
Reviews.Content: Easy transaction. Ordered TV and it arrived in a timely manner-as scheduled. The delivery company called when it arrived in their warehouse and scheduled a delivery with me. I saved a substantial amount of money from retailer's pricing. The only hesitation that I had with ordering the TV was the fact that if there was a problem, it could not be returned to Amazon but you would need to deal directly with the manufacturer, via their warranty program.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: GeiselW
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television about four months back and waited before writing a review as initial impressions can be very misleading.  I am very happy with my purchase. I had read a few complaints about delivery but I found the company that delivered for Amazon (forgot the name - Eagle?) to be very professional.  I received a call to let me know when to expect delivery and was even offered help to set the tv up. I did, however, have to wait a bit from the time I ordered the television until it was delivered so if you are in a hurry, I suppose you would have to pay for expitited service, if possible.  I saved a good bit of money by ordering from Amazon so I was more than happy to delay gratification.  The television itself has excellent picture quality for HDTV stations.  I couldn't be happy with my crisp, clear picture. So far the only disadvantage to this television is its less than stellar sound.  If the house is noisy, it is sometimes difficult for me to hear the sound from the tv.  I have had various televisions in my den for years and I used to be able to sit 12 feet away at my computer and hear the tv perfectly.  No more (unless there are no competing sounds in the house).  Even if I turn up the volume. This is why I did not give this tv a 5 star rating.  Other than this one drawback, I am very impressed with my purchase.  I am hoping that this tv also will have longevity but it is too soon to tell.

Reviews.Title: Gamers Unite!
Reviews.Author: A. Zahnd
Reviews.Content: I mainly wanted an HDTV to fulfill my gaming needs. I currently have an XBOX 360 and must say that the quality of my games have jumped a tall building in a single bound. I can actually read small words with concise clarity. Also, small icons on the HUD of any game are much easier to differentiate. This thing has built in surround sound and also a game mode which enhances video quality and sound. Be it an XBOX 360 or PS3, this gem is definitly an excellent choice for all those game heads out there!P.S.  Hit me up on XBOX Live!Gamer Tag: NETTO37

Reviews.Title: It's easy to describe this TV
Reviews.Author: Polish Logic
Reviews.Content: Amazing.I did a ton of research before deciding to buy. Mostly based on the fact that when viewing all the different ones that friends have purchased, they all seemed to vary quite a bit in terms of picture quality. Various reviews as well as the feedback here had almost nothing but praise about this model. Especially given the price and the whole 'bang for the buck' approach. I then decided to view it and compare it with some other highly rated ones at a local store. I was just blown away by the picture quality.That being said, I came back here and picked one. Hooked it up when I got home and I've been 100% satisfied for well over a month now. All things considered, this TV is, far and away, the best 32" on the market.

Reviews.Title: picture quality excellent
Reviews.Author: James D. Hurt "bucknut"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LNS325ID 32" LCD HDTV has an excellent picture. Set up of the TV was easy. Delivery of the product on time. Tracking & communication from Amazon informative & timely. I would recommend Samsung & Amazon to anyone.

Reviews.Title: da-audio
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Young
Reviews.Content: This unit all around is fantastic and after looking around at different models of the same size by different manufacturer's it was the one i picked for the features and contrast ratio.audio could be a little better,but after sending the output through an amp i have for surround,its great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture
Reviews.Author: P. Horner
Reviews.Content: Best picture in class with the best price from Amazon.  Amazon was about $100-$150 less than all of the big electronic dealers, Circuit City, Best Buy, etc.  Also, no sales tax and free shipping.  Only 2 minor drawbacks, the slow start-up time and the speakers could be a little better.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: GI
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is amazing! Got Direct TV with HD. Picture quality is the best!

Reviews.Title: Both CNET and myself have spoken.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Burton
Reviews.Content: I bought this LCD TV after months of research and waiting and I finally found it here on Amazon for 999.99 w/ free shipping a few months ago.  We had originally purchased a Panasonic LCD from Best Buy and I was very dissapointed with it's black reproduction, but this set does all it claims and that's all one can ask for anymore.  Fully recommended.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it.
Reviews.Author: K. Steele "K09"
Reviews.Content: I went to a retail store where i could see all the tv's displayed next to each other. The Samsung's picture was by far the best. The picture is sharp and the colors are bright and true. After researching it some more I found that Amazon had the best price from a trusted retailer, since purchasing I have been extremely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for gaming and sports!!!
Reviews.Author: Joshua F. Woodard
Reviews.Content: Well I ordered this TV about a month ago and all I can say is that im so impressed that its hard to explain it. Watching football games in HD and playing video games in 1080i is just great. The speakers are kinda weak but who buys a TV for the speakers!! Its non-glossy screen is great at keeping down the glare and you cant even tell. I wish more TV companies would broadcast in widescreen so I could take better advantage of it but you cant have everything!!! This is an all around awesome TV with an even better amazon price!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D
Reviews.Author: Stanley
Reviews.Content: The TV was promptly delivered without visible damage.  The set once I got my cable service upgraded to digital high definition service has delivered a very high quality image on the high definition channels.  The analog channels really show up as substandard comparded with HD.I used a separate receiver speaker system and have found this to be a huge improvement over the TV speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: K. Graff
Reviews.Content: Although we don't have HD reciever for our satellite system yet, the TV itself works beautifully and was well worth the money. The shipping went well too. The TV remote is intutitive and we especially like the fact you can switch between regular picture size and 16:9 for those programs that are transmitted in that format.

Reviews.Title: very nice but...
Reviews.Author: mrfixit
Reviews.Content: guys, if you want to buy this one, its a very nice tv but spend some more money and buy the 40 inch samsung, you will be even more happy.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD - LOUSY DELIVERY
Reviews.Author: John K. Turner "kturner91"
Reviews.Content: First, the Flat Screen Samsung LCD 32" is a great purchase.  Hundreds of dollars cheaper through Amazon than other suppliers.  Hookups are easy, remote is functional, programming is simple, picture is superb.  I have it on Satelite and I believe this 32" LCD is better than the 50" Samsung DLP in playroom.  NOW THE BAD NEWS - Ordered 3-09-07 - got it 4-06-07.  After not hearing anything from anybody I finally emailed Amazon and they said that Eagle tried to call but there was no answer.  What they don't know is I gave them my mobile number WHICH I KEEP ON 24 HRS a DAY!  So they lied.  Ultimately, I called them and they arranged delivery.  They did not have directions so I had to meet them and "guide them in."  Still, the 4 week wait is worth this AWESOME FLATSCREEN

Reviews.Title: Impressive TV, fantastic service from Amazon and Eagle.
Reviews.Author: Polack
Reviews.Content: I will first repeat what has already been stated many times...this TV has an excellent picture, on par with the highest priced models. It looks brilliant even in a bright room, where I currently have it employed.  This set is also performing very well as a monitor for my Dell Dimension computer, incredible desktop workspace with 1366x768 resolution...even more is available as I recently discovered upon hitting "F11" (Windows XP). I compose and surf comfortably with my antenna signal as PIP in the lower right hand corner, PIP plenty large enough for any sporting event (maybe not hockey).  Eagle Shipping was impressive. With free shipping, I received a call within 6 days stating my set was ready for delivery.  A 4 hour window was set up the next Saturday (10-2), I called at 09:30 to verify, the service rep radioed the driver, and his truck was sitting in front of my house already, waiting until 10 so as to not arrive too early.  Box and set were in pristine condition.

Reviews.Title: A Fantastic HD Picture
Reviews.Author: William T. Cole Jr. "wcole67"
Reviews.Content: I'll make this short and sweet. I purchased this Samsung 32" LCD TV through Amazon for about $1,000. All the local stores had list prices that were several hundred dollars more and Amazon had free shipping and no tax. It was a fantastic deal via Amazon. The TV set is absolutely fantastic. That 4000 to 1 contrast ratio really make the difference between a super picture and a so-so picture. So....folks...when you buy a LCDTV make SURE the contrast ratio is at least 3000 to 1 or better.. This is one of the most important specifications to check when deciding on your HD TV purchase. A low contrast ratio gives you a "washed out" picture. Go check a 32" LCD HDTV (that sell for $600 to $700) and you will see the difference because of the low contrast ratio.Lecture is over :-]I should mention however that I did have some trouble with Amazon's shipper. They were several weeks late getting it to me because, somehow, they had an old, obsolete area code for my telephone number and couldn't get in touch me to set up a shipping time delivery window. So they simply FORGOT about me until I finally called them and started raising cain. It took several telephone calls and e-mails to get things straightened out. Very poor service from Amazon's shipper. How they got a long obsolete area code for my phone is anybody's guess. I didn't give it to them.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D 32" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Tosapon Pankumhang "Tos"
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV I ever had. In particular, the quality of picture is awesome. In addition, the design is so cool! Comparing to other high brand names like Sony, Samsung is not only cheaper, but also better features. Somehow, the base of this one is not quite strong.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Elliot L. Day "elliot day"
Reviews.Content: Great tv and great price, shipping was fast and Amazon discloses all shipping costs up front unlike some other stores. Sound and picture are great, I chose this TV over the Sony Bravia both were the same price. I personally like the way this TV picks up the darker colors. Also it looks great with the black piano finish.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG TV- PROBLEM with Sony VGN laptop
Reviews.Author: LALA "Lissy"
Reviews.Content: I love the tv. It has agreat resolution and makes a neat sound when you turn the tv on and off.I live on campus and needed a monitor and a tv so i purchased the Samsung 32" It works great with my apple and other laptops but my new sony vgn laptop does not work with this tv/monitor. The only way to get it to work is to plug in my apple, change the tv/video screen and unplug the apple and quickly plung in the sony laptop. Once the cable is unplugged the connection is lost.With some research, others have found that the Harmony 550 universal remote (about $80 here on amazon) can program the tv/video to work with the laptop each and everytime.If any of you who are looking to buy this tv to also use as a monitor and have a sony laptop you may need to purchase an additional remote to get them to work together.Good luck

Reviews.Title: Product Quality
Reviews.Author: Blake
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture with excellent color and contrast.  NO GLARE what-so-ever.We are very impressed with this product.Note* for the new LCD TV buyer there is a slightly longer delay after pressing the remote, this is the case with all LCD TV's.Product is excellent, however, the delivery company was not that great.  I took off a half day of work but they did not show up until 7 pm.  Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Good experience
Reviews.Author: Michael G. Smith
Reviews.Content: The other positive reviews are not over-blown.  The TV was very, very easy to set up; and, it delivers good picture quality.  Eagle shipping was prompt and the local cartage company they handed the delivery off to was very co-operative in setting a delivery time when I could come from work to meet the driver.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: 1cleverchef "MC"
Reviews.Content: Good TV, I use this as a PC moniter as well. The TV does not accept a PC signal via HDMI for some reason, so I use the VGA. I Dont have a HD cable box yet, so I have not used the HDMI. The TV has 2 HDMI, but only one reguler Hi Def input. My dvd player and X box have reguler Hi def cable outs, so this causes a problem. The connection issues are the only problems I have with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: More than satisfied with the picture.
Reviews.Author: Racer North "Rusty"
Reviews.Content: When I first received the TV I did not have the HD package from TW Cable.Even before that was turned on the picture was quite nice. I had been watching an older (much older) Samsung which was very tired.  Once the HDwas switched on....WOW....I couldn't believe the clarity and sharpness ofmovie quality TV.  I found myself watching shows that I never watched before.Battle Star Galactica was just stunning. Just as everyone says, DiscoveryChannel takes your breath away.As for the setup, I believe it would be 10 minutes tops if one is savvy with these types of things..very easy although the manual left something to be desired.Delivery came through EGL on the first scheduled day. I am in the greatstate of Maine so I expected it to take a little longer...not so. I waspleased that the delivery was made at an alternate address for me so I didn't have to take time off from work. Everything was fine. There was alittle damage on the outside of the box, but the packing insided was morethan adequate to take care of the contents.This is a great TV for the price and I would recommend it for purchase.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect choice for 32"
Reviews.Author: H. Le
Reviews.Content: Pros: Looks great, very sleek and contemporary. Definitely great for gaming, the graphics are so clear and detailed! The same can be said if you have HDTV for your service.Cons: Some small complaints but can be overlooked once you get used to it. The TV takes 5 secs to turn on. The remote is probably the worst thing about this product. It's not very responsive at all. Feels like you have to hold down the button for a second to get a response. And you literally have to point it straight at the TV otherwise you get no connectivity.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: R. Patrie
Reviews.Content: This model is being discontinued so there's a good chance you can save several hundred dollars. The big box stores are $300-$500 more than web retailers (J&R; or TigerDirect).Awesome picture. Took very little time to get the picture perfect. Hooked up Directv HD. Tuned into NASCAR's Bud Shootout and it blew me away. I never noticed the age spots on Waltrip's face. College hoops are also much more enjoyable when you can see the number on the jerseys. The 4:3 is a little grainy and standard def is watchable. For the money you can't find a better HD set.

Reviews.Title: Amazing HDTV! End of Story
Reviews.Author: Pat "Patrick Greenwell"
Reviews.Content: What a deal. For just about 1000 bucks, you can own a great starter HDTV and immerse yourself into the world of HDTV. Great pictures, glossy finish is sexy, and sound is nowhere as bad as some people complain. There is not one 32 inch TV i would have chosen over this, not even the Sony's or Panny's. Thanks guys for all your reviews before I bought mine!

Reviews.Title: Sound problems
Reviews.Author: Alex Tehrani "Teacher in charge"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, but recently a humming noise in the background has made it difficult to enjoy the HD-TV experience. Samsung will send a technician to look at the problem.

Reviews.Title: Remarkable clarity
Reviews.Author: oyster
Reviews.Content: My wife and I walked into one of those big-box electronic stores, and from about 10 feet away,passed our eyes over the usual wall of illuminated televisions. We were both struck by one set. We discovered it to be this Samsung device. Fortunately, the store had sold out on Black Friday; we found one at Amazon for $400 less (and no tax!). Eagle delivered it very agreeably (the courteous truckers carried it upstairs for us)within a week. After three weeks, we continue to be astonished at the beauty of the images, and the clarity of the sound (I'm hard-of-hearing). Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Sean D. Tyler "seanbo0"
Reviews.Content: If you like TV from a gaming perspective but do not need 1080p for any reason other than to wow people you will be happy with this TV. I purchased this TV back in October and I've been very happy with it since.The Strong points: For a 1080i TV HDCable stations look  very close to 1080p without spending 3000 dollars.2 HDMI inputs.  THe gaming mode feature works really well however do not expect a very good picture via Composit. Make sure you pick up HDMI for PS3 and Component Cables for either the 360 or WiiMicrosoft's gaming division consulted Samsung for their gaming mode so it looks stellar with a 360 hooked up in 720p or 1080i. Simply said any system input going through the component or HDMI looks GREAT.Make sure you pick up a pair of Component cables for your wii if you're going to buy this TV so you can get 480p.THe Weak: 1 Component input only. You'll need a switch box if you hate switching around cables on the back. Poor PC connection quality. PC computers look really poorly rendered on machine. However my Macbook Pro looked "Ok".Do not buy this as a monitor for a computer. It's an HDTV... use it as an HDTV..I love this TV. It's modest. Cheap. Great for gaming. However if you are Jonesing for a 1080p TV you shouldn't even be look at LCD tvs... Look for a Plasma.....

Reviews.Title: Kickass
Reviews.Author: R. Phan
Reviews.Content: I guess I was so excited to get this HDTV viewing experience up and running that I didn't even read the manual.  I'm not big on cable TV, so I bought this TV knowing that it had a built in tuner for Over-the-air local HDTV.  When I attached an antenna to it, the picture was horrible only because I couldn't get a signal.  I found out later thru trial and error that I had to program the TV to scan for channels.  Once that was done, a tear rolled down my face because "Heroes" was broadcast in HDTV Widescreen on NBC.  It was simply beautiful.  I'd use this TV as a body pillow, but it'd be a hassle unplugging it every night.  So remember kids, if you're using an antenna, go through the setup of scanning for hdtv signals over the air (using the TV's menu).Other than that, I just hooked up an Oppo DVD upconverter (via HDMI) and have noticed a sweet difference compared to my regular DVD player.  Popped in XMEN 3 and had my jaw dropped the whole time.  I'm telling you. The picture is mesmorizing.  Carmen Electra could be standing next to my TV in a two-piece bikini, doing jumping jacks, and I'd still have my eyes fixed on this TV.Alright, enough of that.  You get the idea.

Reviews.Title: Died after a week
Reviews.Author: orion "orion"
Reviews.Content: Nice looking TV, The picture was great. Even SD channels looked very good. One problem-it just died after a week. I took it back to Best Buy without a problem and got the 40" Samsung (LNS4041D). So far that's very nice. I'm glad I got the bigger TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald P. Weber
Reviews.Content: Due to a lightning strike, I was forced to replace our bedroom TV. After much research and having replaced our family room TV with a new off brand RP 51" TV, I learned that Samsung was rated as the best by several consumer organizations and people who previously purchased LCD TV's. The picture clarity of the Samsung 32" LNS3251D is unbelievable. This television makes all the channels look like high definition and I don't have it commected to a HD tuner. I highly recommend this set and shopping through Amazon.com, I was able to save hundreds of dollars.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Henri James Tieleman
Reviews.Content: It was extremely easy to install; the image is absolutely beyond imagination, and as for the price, its quality ratio is at the top.  I am a loyal customer to Sony, but I have converted since!!

Reviews.Title: Expensive but great quality
Reviews.Author: Big-Z
Reviews.Content: This set gives Sony a run for its money; in fact comparing them side by side at a store, I thought the Samsung was a bit better. I have not used it with HDTV yet since I have not subscribed to that on Dish yet, but for regular satellite TV and DVDs it is great. No problems or negatives.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED WITH AMAZON AND SAMSUNG.
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Moshier
Reviews.Content: I order my TV from Amazon and within 9 days, I was sitting comfortably in my chair watching my favorite movie on it. I was extremely pleased with the timely manner in which my TV was shipped and delivered. I tracked it from Reno all the way to my local delivery service in Syracuse NY. It was delivered the following day without as much as a mark that would cause me to fear damage had come to it. As for the TV, it has a sharp, clear picture, along with a handsome design. To top all this, I saved $400.00 by purchasing it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: B. Powell
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I wanted a reasonably priced one as I'm only going to be in the States for two years. The picture quality is very good and the sound is pretty good as well. My only criticism would be a small one and that is the instructions are not very easy to read.There is another criticism but I don't know if it applies to all TVs in the States; why doesn't it have a scart connection?

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Lynn Driver "On-line novice"
Reviews.Content: My shopping experience on Amazon and with Electronics Express was fantastic.  This was my first experience shopping on-line for a high ticket item...a TV.  The price was outstanding, the process simple, and the delivery awesome.  I ordered the TV on a tuesday and it was delivered by thursday...absolutely incredible.  I will not only shop Amazon again, but will also add Electronics Express to my shopping guide.  This is what customer service is all about!

Reviews.Title: Well designed with minor flaws...
Reviews.Author: oaklandgayasian
Reviews.Content: I have a mostly Sony Audio/Video system. I can't help but compare my Samsung LCD TV to a Sony product.I'm finding little flaws that are annoying now that I've used if for several months. I don't know if all of the flaws are Samsung's fault, but...Starting with the remote control. Too many unnecessary buttons. Sony would have hidden most of these.Many buttons are for functions you would only need to access once or at most occasionally. They could be accessed through the setup menu. (Channel Manager, Auto Program and channel Add/Delete come to mind.)Other buttons shouldn't be necessary, but are required because the TV cannot automatically sense the ratio of the incoming signal. I tried to set the ratio for each channel per the instruction manual, but the TV doesn't have the options that the manual thinks it should have. I think this should either be automatic or be set as part of the initial programming.I am surprised at how long it takes for the TV to begin showing a picture once you've turned it on. I think it's somewhere around 3-5 seconds. And it takes about the same time to switch channels. It almost seems defective.I have tested the tuner (works well) and almost all of the other input options. I don't have and HDMI source, so I couldn't try that one, but the others function well.I recommend this TV, but be aware of the minor shortcomings.

Reviews.Title: Great product, price, & shipping
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: After searching around, Amazon had one of the best prices around for this TV.  Best Buy, CC, and Tweeter couldn't match it and didn't want to deal.  Initial concerns were around the shipping not displaying as freight forward vs UPS as my preference would have been UPS which based on weight of 32 lbs, one would expect using that vendor.  Amazon had a lenghtly shipping timeframe which caused great concern as to timing and how delivery might work which wasn't notified until post sale.  So far so good and it appears Eagle Freight has done a great job getting the product out even around the holidays even prior to Amazon's initial delivery time period.  I've heard horror stories from other people on freight forwarding.  Dispite having to be around an entire day waiting for delivery, Eagle appears very reputable and so far an excellent freight forward company.  Packages are easily tracked just like Fedex/UPS.  No issues.  Price savings of $200 plus free mount well worth it.  Sony and Samsung are top LCD models.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with purchase and delivery
Reviews.Author: P. Buechner
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to say that I was very nervous about purchasing something so expensive and fragile as a TV from Amazon. We received the TV within two weeks of order and couldn't be happier with it. My experience was very smooth and the TV is great. Easy set-up. Nice pictures. Great reception over AIR to HD stations once an antennae was plugged in the back.

Reviews.Title: TV meets my expectations
Reviews.Author: B. Banks
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this HDTV by Samsung as an upgrade from a 26 inch Sharp LCD HDTV for my bedroom.  So far, I am very pleased with my purchase.  I was concerned about shipping based on some of the reviews I read, however there were no problems in this area.  Amazon's shipper contacted me to arrange delivery the day after it arrived in my state.  The TV arrived on time and the driver took it upstairs for me and even helped me set it up on the stand.  I connected the TV to the HDMI input on my cable box, and the picture is excellent on both HD and standard definition stations. I used the antenna outlets to hook to my cable and am able to use PIP to view regular cable stations and digital stations at the same time.  I have not yet connected a PC. but plan to do so. I am really enjoying this set and would reccomend it to anyone in the market for a 32 inch LCD set.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: J. Lang
Reviews.Content: This 32" samsung has excellent sound and picture. It is flat, not heavy and reliable. Undoubtedly the best TV I have ever owned. Amazon shipped it free, on time and at an excellent price. It worked perfectly out of the box. Would I buy it again??? . . . Definitely!

Reviews.Title: I'm Impressed!
Reviews.Author: Reyhook
Reviews.Content: Purchased mine on 2 Feb through J&R; Music. Received it on Feb 6. Fast shipping with reasonable shipping fees. Read an article in latest Consumer Reports on HDTVs. They highly recommend picture quality as number one purchasing factor. So far, it's looks like I made the right choice.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: R. Tomlinson "rickyt"
Reviews.Content: This Samsung 32" TV exceeds my expectations.  The picture is outstanding (comparable to a Toshiba which cost me twice as much last year). The only drawback I can think of is that the sound is not as great as the picture quality.Still, after using this TV for about a month, I would recommend this set to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item through Amazon.  Have read prior reviews regarding problems with shipping.  Shipping was great--item arrived within 2 business days of purchase.  Setup was quick--about 5-10 minutes I was up and running.  Very happy with this product.  Those who may be considering adding a 2 year service plan be aware that Samsung offered a 3 month extension, of the 1 year they already offer, to anyone that register's within 10 days of purchase--so paying $100+ for only 9 month's of warranty seemed like too much to me, up to you though.

Reviews.Title: The Samsung LNS3251D is a "class act"
Reviews.Author: Tezza "Tezza"
Reviews.Content: We gave our old 32 inch "tube" TV to my girlfriend's grandmother.  To replace it, I knew I wanted an LCD and my imagination turned to Samsung, as I have always liked their PC monitors in the past.When I spotted this beauty, I knew that Samsung quality and the 4000:1 contrast ratio would result in an awesome TV.  And I was right!The TV was pretty easy to set up.  The remote is probably one of the most intuitive I've used in quite a while.The real story is the picture quality.  The dark blacks of the TV are awesome.  We watched "Reservoir Dogs", which is a fairly darkly lit "mood" film, and the Samsung really did a nice job of the picture.I usually run the LCD on a "cool" setting so that the colors are not too halloween like.  Definitely the color is on the cool side, however the color is so unobtrusive, it really does the job.If I was at all picky, I would question that the speakers are just "adequate".  But anyone who is buying a TV oif this quality is probably going to run the sound through a separate sound system.All in all you won't be disappointed with the classy quality and picture quality of this TV.If you're looking for an "upscale" or dare I say "best of breed" 32 inch flat LCD, look no farther than the Samsung LNS3251D.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: TK426
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set on black friday for $1079.99. No complaints about the shipping service. This is my first HDTV and I have to say that i'm impressed overall. The quality of the picture is fantastic. It's crystal clear. Standard definition looks pretty good too. I've been using this with my X-Box 360. In fact, I bought this set for that purpose. 360 games looks awesome on this set. Many of the 360 Kiosk in the stores use Samsung HDTV's. I also downloaded a couple of HD shows from X-Box live. The quality of the images is unbelievable. Now I'm tempted to get the HD-DVD drive for the 360. Another feature that I like is the 3241d ability to remember settings for each input. Example. You can have your brightness setting set to 65 for S-video1 input, and Brightness set to 50 for component input. Don't have to play around with those settings once it's set.The only complaint that I have so far is the sound, which is why I gave four stars instead of 5. It just isn't impressive to me. I'm going to fix that problem with my set of Klipsch RSX 4 speakers. As far as the 5 second start up goes, it not a problem. What's 5 seconds? Anyway, in spite of the sound it's a great set that will not dissapoint.

Reviews.Title: Excelent TV, Execelent Price
Reviews.Author: S. Patel
Reviews.Content: This Tv is great, the color the brightness,and picture clarity.  The speakers are not the best but okay for a small room.  I am only dissapointed with the remote.  I would have expected better.  Overall great TV for $1029 delivered, almost $300 less than any retail store.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Karen Lynn Butler
Reviews.Content: Light weight and easy to install.  Has an unbelievable picture.  I will never buy a fat screen tv again.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Jerome L. Steinberg
Reviews.Content: Wondeful TV. Great price from Amazon. Well made, logical controls, easy setup, fantastic picture. In short everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: Love this tv. When it arrived at the house, my dad was even jealous. LOLI still get compliments on this tv and I purchased a long while ago.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: E. Lo
Reviews.Content: I had it for about four years. Worked very well, never had any issues with it. Sold it after getting a newer Samsung tv. Note that this only has 720p so not ideal if you want to connect a computer to it.

Reviews.Title: An excellent Super Bowl purchase 2+ yrs. ago!
Reviews.Author: C. Morrison "cimor"
Reviews.Content: I needed a new television since my 15" set wasn't "doing it" for my grandsons and visitors, so after much research I decided upon the Samsung LNS3251D 32" LCD HDTV.  Of course I priced them everywhere and Amazon had the best price until----SUPER BOWL TIME---big TV sales everywhere.The weight was of the TV was easy for me to bring home, and the set-up was so simple even with a separate cable system box and DVD player.  I still needed to call my cable provider for the HD, but I could still watch it without it.  The TV is set-up user friendly as you may notice if you look at the backside.  I've had no problems and the picture is unbelievably clear with perfect color.  I'd recommend it to anyone thinking of upgrading to a larger, or an HD TV.  Samsung LNS3251D 32-Inch LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: Samsung for the win
Reviews.Author: chris tallant
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th Sammy I've bought, love them, no problems with any of them.  I use this nightly as a gaming tv in my office and will probably hang it in bedroom when it's time to upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Karmadoggy
Reviews.Content: Great little tv. Got a lot of use out of it until my Border Collie saw a dog on TV and attacked the screen. My only complaint would be that sometimes when you power it on, it hesitates before making the "turned on" sound so for a few seconds you don't know if you should hit the power button again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but small by todays standards
Reviews.Author: Fergie "Fergie"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV back in 2006 and it still looks great.  It doesn't do 1080p, but at least it does 1080i.  We don't have a blueray player and we actually got rid of HD cable service because it was so expensive (waiting for FiOS to hit our area) so we just have cheap cable and a rabbit Ear antenna, but it picks up HD signals over the air and the look great.  We connect a laptop up to the TV to watch a lot of videos on HULU and they all look awesome, just as good as when we had an HD box and were DVRing the shows, except now we don't have to set the schedule.I don't think this model is available anymore, i'm sure Samsung has a comparible model now.Samsungs seem to be a bit more expensive but to this day still look better than most of the other TVs out there.  I don't forsee us upgrading our TV for quite a while as this TV has all the connections we'd need and is big enough for our living room.My friend just bought a very similar 22" and another friend just bought a similar 42" all from Samsung and they love them.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD Value!
Reviews.Author: Hemisphere Dancer "Hemisphere Dancer"
Reviews.Content: Great Set Last Year When I ordered it From Amazon based on a Consumer Reports Review saying at the time it was the Best Over-All Value. Decided to Move Up to the 40A650(1080P) and Will Put 32" Set in The Bedroom. Used Amazon's White Glove Delivery and The Entire Process, Including More Than $300 Savings Over My Local Best Buy or Circuit City, Was Without Exception...A Great Value. Highly Recommend! NOTE: In Stock & Ordered From Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: R. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I bought a different brand first and it lasted about 2 months. What a nightmare getting my money back on that one. I replaced that one with the Samsung and have had no problems. HD is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Anita Kubik "welovemaltese"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our Dining Room and we just love it!!  Great high quality picture, convenient size, and the piano finish is just beautiful!  Love it, love it, love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for several months now, and I must say that I am very happy.  The picture is bright, sharp, and colorful.  HD DVD and Blu-Ray discs look excellent on this set, and it is really the best way to use this set.  Standard DVDs look very good, but would probably be better with a DVD player that up-converts standard DVDs to HD quality.  Standard cable TV looks good, but not as good as on a conventional tube TV.  The menus are easy to navigate.Energy consumption: First, this TV puts off some heat.  Not as bad as a plasma, but I definitely feel the heat on my hand within 4 to 5 inches of the screen.  The screen gets very warm to the touch, but not hot.  The set has an energy saving feature that can be controlled from the remote.  The energy saving feature has four settings (Off, Low, Med, and High).  The 'off' setting gives you the brightest and most colorful picture.  I only use this setting for watching movies, or if the room lighting is very bright.  The 'high' setting reduces the brightness of the screen, and considerably cuts down on the heat output.  Personally, I use the 'medium' and 'high' settings for most of my regular TV viewing.My only real complaint of this set is the remote.  It has a poor layout, with the number buttons near the top and the 'Enter' button on the lower part of the remote.  If you enter channel selections directly, you have to awkwardly shift your hand to hit the enter button.  The most annoying thing about the remote is the fact that you have to point it directly at the TV for it to work (no bouncing signals off the walls like most remotes).  If you are pointing the remote off center of the TV by just a few degrees, it won't work.  I don't know if it a design problem with the remote or the sensor in the TV, but it sucks.  Whoever designed it that way should be taken out back and flogged!Overall, a great TV that I highly recommend.  I took one star away because of the design of the remote.  Happy viewing!

Reviews.Title: another excellent job by samsung
Reviews.Author: Vadims Kosolapovs
Reviews.Content: I have it for about 9 months now.Everything works fine.Excellent picture.One of the sleekest designs for last year models.Bright colors.Wish it would have cable ready slot being  a cable subscriber.Plus cable makes tvs remote & some of the features completely useless as well as cable box remote becomes  handicapped with some features like chaging the volume by pressing once in a time to raise or lower  bars on volume control versus continuous action. 20 watts of power of onboard speaker system  deffinitely not enough for poor channel signal or in the same room with working a/c.Consider buying home theater system with this tv set.However most of tvs stay within the same range of power in this class.Could have more inputs available if you have a lot of gear to link with.Overall very satisfied with picture quality & style.Deffinitely recommend it!!!

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: John Cannon
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. Also works great as a PC monitor. The kicker is hooking it up for video conferencing via Instant Messenger. Wow my freinds are Life Size now!

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Callum McGowan "Callum"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, fantastic picture and great connectivity options.  I don't use the internal speakers (home theatre) so can't comment on the sound quality.Such a great TV, but now I want a bigger one!

Reviews.Title: great tv but dead pixel problems from day 1
Reviews.Author: T. Ulreich
Reviews.Content: well not from day one more like day 15 since I've had the tv, at first I thought it was a bad connection but then I called up samsung and its a dead pixel problem.  the tv turns red and the pixels move with the tv no joke, I have pictures to prove it and will post a video on youtube if I can.  Then it fixes itself and looks as if it never happened, well luckily its still under warranty and hopefully it can be fixed and never happen again, but anyway back to the tv.  360 looks amazing on this tv, regular xbox looks just ok.  as for pc hook up its ok as well, the text is really small but playing videos from your computer looks really good and its not bad as a computer monitor.  There are 3 things I don't like about the tv, the remote the glossy finish, and it takes awhile to turn on.  The glossy finish does look classy but it scratches really easily and I don't like that I like my tv looking new you can't see them far away but when you look at it up close its very noticeable.  Yes and the sound and remote is week but not horrible as some people say I actually don't mind the remote.  If you're looking for quality go with this tv if you're looking for reliability buy it at a store and not online.

Reviews.Title: True love is the LNS4051D HDTV
Reviews.Author: Clark Kays
Reviews.Content: That's right, I said the 40" model.  We purchased the 32" on Amazon, but we ended up selling it (for a loss) on eBay.  We realized the 40" is the only choice for a true HDTV experience.However, both are exceptional LCD TVs.  Every time I watch my HDTV, I am self affirmed that we made the right decision choosing Samsung.  Don't wait.  Make the HD plunge today!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: F. Doll
Reviews.Content: This samsung lns3251d is an excellent hdtv. I read alot of the reviews I think it lives up to all the positive reviews it got. I was a little worried about all the negative reviews about eagle shipping.But I have no complaints about the shipping.

Reviews.Title: works good and looks good
Reviews.Author: J. E. Mendelssohn
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert in display systems, but the Samsung TV works as advertised and has a great picture. It is certainly much better than our old analog TV. Another great feature is that it is so light. My wife decided to have some friends over to watch a DVD and instead of crowding everyone in the our small TV room, I simply moved the TV into the living room and we watched in comfort. I still haven't figured out all the bells and whistles, but I have no complaints and I am glad that we bought it.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my choice of 32" LCD TV.  It looks very smart - shiny black stand and edge of screen, I like how the speakers are hidden away and don't make the TV wider than it needs to be.  The picture is superb with HD digital cable.  I haven't played around with the settings, I found the picture type I like and that's it so far.I ordered it online on a saturday evening, and I had it delivered to me the following Thursday, very impressive, and ahead of the expected delivery date from Eagle couriers.  The only negative point is that they only deliver tues - fri with a window of 12-6pm.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: John P. Linn
Reviews.Content: I'm really impressed with the quality of the tv.  The picture quality is amazing and it lives up to the reputation that this particular unit has.  It's well worth the extra money.

Reviews.Title: Great tv - Great price
Reviews.Author: Andres F. Garcia Agudelo "Hadden18"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv directly from Amazon with a high discount and free shipping.The tv arrived before expected in perfect condition. This is what I call a great offer.About the TV, the image quality is great. If you have a room where you can control the light, you will have the best picture. The viewing angle is very good. This TV looks awesome with my PS3 with great colors, a fine response time, and even the color of the TV it self (black) makes it a very good pal of the ps3. I don't have HDTV so I have no tested this feature. In conclusion a great offer by Amazon and a very good TV. I also tested the tv with my brother's xbox 360 and the quality is very, very good. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Gregory W. York
Reviews.Content: I looked at many HD TVs and this is by far the best one for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great product - perfect for smallsh city flat
Reviews.Author: Christopher A.
Reviews.Content: I bought this on recommendation from friends. Turns out to be perfect for a smallish flat.I swivel base gets a lot of use in my house.  Clarity is superb.  I use this for both TV and computer monitor with my laptop - I use Microsoft Media Center - and never move my laptop - I use a wireless keyboard and mouse - it is overkill for a monitor - but it allows for freedom.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Stew B
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV.  I mounted it on the wall and it went up easily and does not stick that far out from the wall.  The picture is great.  Set up went really smoothly.  Only problem I had was with the shipping company.  They totally lost my order.  After waiting, I had to reorder it.  The second time it came on time with no problems.  I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good 32" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Cong C. Dinh
Reviews.Content: Pictures is beautiful with HD antena reception.Simple to operate. Only one problem with remote control.Need to point the remote control directly to TV's sensor from 3-4 feet away to operate. Don't know if the the remote control is defective. Will talk to Samsung to find out.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: Alli
Reviews.Content: I love my TV.  I loved this TV from the moment I received it.  Just to make sure everything remained in good working order, I waited a few months before writing this review.  If you stay on Eagle (call them first and them keep on top of them), you'll get the TV within a very reasonable time.  The picture quality is GREAT and Amazon's prices are still $200 less than the major retailers.  If you've been looking for a medium sized LCD - this is it!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: R. Toohey
Reviews.Content: This TV is every bit as good as described ... truly an outstanding picture!

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD - HDTV from Samsung
Reviews.Author: BJSimmons "BJSimmons"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this Samsung LCD from Amazon and received it in about two weeks. Good price w/ free shipping and no tax, We saved several hundred bucks. Anyway, out of the box and watching great TV in about five minutes. With just ordinary cable no HD input the picture is outstanding and is being used in our bedroom. The bottom line: When we have enough money to buy another larger Samsung for the living room, we will do so without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Andrew

Reviews.Title: Gaming, DVDs, Blue-Ray, Digital TV... it all looks beautiful
Reviews.Author: Vincent "Random Ransom"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV from Amazon at the beginning of January with standard shipping.  After some issues with the payment methods, I received the TV on the 18th (the earliest estimated shipment day).  Since then, I have nothing but good things to say about this Television.I didn't realize that HD channels come through right over the air.  With the built in HD tuner, I have been able to watch HD shows on this TV, and I don't even have cable or satellite TV.  I love being able to watch my favorite shows like Heroes, CSI, Prison Break, Medium, and even late night shows like Leno and Letterman all in HD!  The colors are striking, and I love having tons of sub-channels like 58-1, 58-2, 10-1, 10-2, 10-3, and more while still being able to watch the regular channel 58 and 10 if I choose to.I've heard some people on here complaining about how you can't stretch channels that already come through in HD (I've noted that channels that are digital such as 720p and 1080i can't be stretched), but I think that has more to do with the channel transmitting the image in 4:3 rather than 16:9.  I can't wait until every channel has to transmit in HD and in 16:9.  I've already noticed a few commercials that are in wide screen without needing to stretch them.  Just wait for it boys and girls.  It'll happen, and you'll have no reason to complain about such things after that.I heard that the TV has only HDMI 1.0.  Let me tell you my experience.I've hooked up my PS3 to this TV using only a generic HDMI cable (not name brand or anything).  The video and audio come through just fine.  The TV only goes to 1080i, but I'm not complaining.  Gaming has gone to a whole new level due to the clarity of this TV.  I never noticed some of the detail of Genji: Days of the Blade until I played it on this TV.I've got a DVD player, a VCR, a Game Cube, and a PS3 hooked up to this puppy, and I still have room to hook up more stuff.  I'm in heaven, and I haven't even hooked up my computer to it yet!Lastly, I want to note how clear the viewing of movies is.  Using my PS3 to play BD movies (Blue-ray Disk) has helped me truly appreciate the quality that the BDs have.I can't wait to have a surround sound system to hook up to this puppy and bring things to yet another level of greatness.The one drawback that I've seen in this TV is that everyone at my house wants to crowd around it to watch their favorite program.  Sorry Mom, but you'll have to watch 24 and Jack Bower in Standard Definition on the TV upstairs.  :DI definitely say it's worth the money to buy this TV.  Whether it's just to watch DVDs and BDs, watch TV in HD, or play games in high quality, I think you'll get what pay for and more.  I'm sure that newer technology probably looks even better than this does, but if you're looking for a great deal, I definitely recommend this TV.---Short summery of this review----HD sub-channels are a wonderful surprise even without the dish or cable-The channel stretching issue will resolve itself in time-HDMI 1.0 is no issue for PS3 audio and video (and am assuming the 360 too)-Wonderful connectivity to multiple media devices-DVD and BD movies are beautifully presented-Definitely recommended for your cost efficient purchase

Reviews.Title: Rivals the picture quality of my 50" Pioneer Plasma
Reviews.Author: abellofi "AB"
Reviews.Content: I've owned plasma TV's for two years now.  My latest plasma, the Pioneer 5070, has just about the best pictures available in the industry.  I recently picked up the Samsung LN-S3251D for my living room and can honestly say that its picture rivals that of my cherished Pioneer.Pros:* This set has discrete IR codes for all its available input sources; perfect for a universal remote control (they are in the Harmony remote database).* Excellent picture quality (black levels, contrast).  Some reviewers had me worried about DNIe mode artifacts but they are NOT noticeable to me and I am very picky.* Sound quality is good for internal speakers. If you want bass, use a home stereo system (this is the case with any set however).  Turning on "surround" mode makes vocals slightly muffled; I tend to leave it off and the sound is very clear.* This set maintains different picture modes for each input (ie. Standard, movie, etc).Possible Cons (at least for some other users):* No QAM tuner. Not a deal breaker for me because I have an HD DVR.  You can use the ATSC tuner with a mini HD antenna to pick up all your local HD broadcasts if you need to.* The supplied remote is very directional; that is, you need to aim it directly at the TV - a few degrees off center and no luck.  I do NOT have this issue when using my Harmony 880 with this set.* No non-linear 16:9 stretch mode.  Some sets have a mode where 4:3 contents is stretched to fit the full 16:9 screen by stretching the edges more than the center where you usually direct your attention.  I, however, usually find this mode distracting because I perceive it like looking through a fish bowl.  So, if you're like me and just get used to and like everything stretched linearly then this won't be an issue for you.FYI's:* Supported aspect ratios are "16:9", "4:3", "Zoom 1" and "Zoom 2".  If you are using HDMI/DVI, are set to "16:9", and are displaying 4:3 content, this set WILL NOT stretch the 4:3 content to fill the screen.  You must rely on your player or Set-top box to do this for you.  However, when using any other source (S-video, Component, Composite, etc) in "16:9" to display 4:3, the picture WILL be stretched to fill the screen.  I don't use "Zoom 1" or "Zoom 2".* Power Saving mode is best set to "Medium" as other users have mentioned.* Register with Samsung within 10 days of purchase and get an extra three months added to your warranty period.Amazon pricing and shipping was excellent as always.

Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month and a half and I still can't believe how amazing it is!  The picture quality is second to none. The standard definition channels look good as well. My video games, which i've connected via a component cable, look great.  The only drawback was that it only had 1 component connection, which if you have many electronics that you'd like to connect in a such a way, you'll find yourself limited. Reviews.Author: E. Nimorwicz
Reviews.Content: Did do much research on different TVs in stores and online.  To purchase high priced item like this online was biggest hurdle. Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: RB
Reviews.Content: Picture is great - better in the house than I saw in the stores.  This one is definitely a much better TV than all the others that are a couple hundred dollars cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Samsung lns3251d

Reviews.Content: I bought this TV last week. I got it for an excellent price on Amazon with free standard shipping. I was a little worried abt Eagle shipping delays(seeing some of the user reviews). Reviews.Title: Great TV Very Happy
Reviews.Author: M. McGrath "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV perfect picture and no problems yet had it for about 3 months.  Xbox 360 looks amazing!

Reviews.Title: Good Buy

Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about a month now and I love it! The glossy finish is beautiful and the picture quality is excellent. The tv performs well even with regular tv but the hd picture is incredible. The blacks are deep and show tremendous details and the colors really pop with very little tuning out of the box. I would highly recommend this tv to anyone looking for a great 32" tv at a very good amazon price. I had no problems with eagle delivery. I used the free shipping and I had the tv in 10 days.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D 32" Wide LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: D. Lichter
Reviews.Content: Product shipped much sooner than promised and was in perfect condition.  Great picture quality and sound and the price was better than any offered by other Electronics chains.  I'm glad I went with Amazon for this one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D 32
Reviews.Author: Darl Gagliano "Darl"
Reviews.Content: The HD picture is very good.  The analog picture is not as good as a standard tv.  Overall, I am very satisfied and will be more so when HD broadcasting becomes more common.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV!!
Reviews.Author: Michael G. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and I did a lot of research before deciding on theSamsung 32" LCD. The online reviews were favorable but I went to a localvideo store and compared the Samsung with other, more expensive, brandsand, to my untrianed eye, it was the clear winner, especially considering the price.Amazon delivered on time, with no damage to the box. Reviews.Title: great picture, no complaints
Reviews.Author: Sara "scooter lover"
Reviews.Content: We have been very happy with our Samsung.  The picture using HDMI cables has been fantastic.  Everyone finds excuses to come to our house on game night.

Reviews.Author: William A. Lawyer
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific product.  I looked at a large number of HDTVs and I am very pleased that I chose this one.

Reviews.Content: Given a good quality signal, the Samsung 32 inch LCD performs as well as any HDTV I've seen. The smaller screen helps to make the images more dense, the colors are great and motion distortion is minimal.

Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, outstanding black cabinet. Money versus quality I think this HDTV is the best buy on the market. Only bad remark for buying this item on Amazon is if you take the free shipping with Eagle I would rate that as a 1 (very poor).

Reviews.Content: During my research, this TV received one of the highest performance ratings. I found it to exceed my expectations.  The picture is vividly clear and the sound is outstanding.  The interface/user manual is consumer friendly.  I congratulate Samsung on developing an extremely high quality product.The first TV received was defective. Reviews.Title: Very nice Digital TV
Reviews.Author: Wonhee Lee
Reviews.Content: It's just beutiful.I wish I could buy bigger LCD, but 32" is good for now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Anania "Mike"
Reviews.Content: I've been very satisfied w/ this purchase. The TV arrived in good condition, very quickly at Eagle shipping. Rather than have to have someone home when they delivered it, I went and picked it up myself at their depot and had no problems. The TV had no dead pixels and has worked great. I've got it hooked up to an HD DVR through Cox cable in the Phoenix area, and the picture looks great on HD channels, although some programs are clearer than others, I'm sure based on how they were filmed. We're using it in the bedroom and 32" is a great size for that. The remote could be a little nicer, maybe have a backlight and be a better shape, but we end up using the DVR remote most of the time anyway. I'd recommend this tv to anyone considering an LCD HD at this size.

Reviews.Title: Great product for home office!
Reviews.Author: P. Marshall
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my husband's home office.  It's a great look and fit for the built-in bookshelves we have.  The product shipped quickly and was in perfect condition. The picture is wonderful.  BTW, our local gym has these TVs throughout the facility. This was a great buy...worth every dollar!

Reviews.Author: Gary R. Katz
Reviews.Content: Great Picture, the best I've seen compared to other similar-sized screens.  The remote is not intuitive, the manual is terrible, we still don't have the wiring to other components figured out.  Other than those minor things its definitely worth buying.

Reviews.Title: Question your purchase.
Reviews.Author: Adam B. Faust "Faust"
Reviews.Content: Bought a Samsung 50 inch DLP about six months ago.  When we got it home we couldn't get it to stay on, so the store sent over someone to replace the bulb.  Unfortunately the store support ended after 90 days.  Then...Samsung was supposed to take over.  Fast forward five months "today."  The TV started shutting off after five mins of playing.  Called Samsung, unfortunately we moved and didn't have the receipt.  A call from the store didn't help Samsung understand that the TV is still covered.  Our six month old $1699 TV, is now going to cost us $717 to fix.  Thanks Samsung...from a guy who bought two laptops and two TVs and a microwave from you...never again.

Reviews.Content: Excited to wait for ship't arrival today. VERY disappointed this thing is not working at all. Only has audio, video is none, only black screen. Call Samsung support and response is SLOW!! Now hope Amazon will response better for return/exchange.

Reviews.Content: Ok I have minimal complaints about this TV.  I have spent about 3 months doing research on LCD HD TVs and this came out to be the best.  The HD channels come in looking phenomenal!  The colors are warm and natural most of the time.  I have seen some color issues with DVDs and the non-HD TV channels but they are minor (a technophile might notice).  This TV is sleek and good looking.  I was actually pretty amazed by the sound it gave, fairly rich for TV speaker..  I did not have any issues with dead pixels on this TV.  I know many people have complained about this.  I ordered this directly through Amazon and it was delivered by Eagle with free shipping.  I have heard a number of complaints about them taking a long time to deliver.  Usually Amazon is 2-3 days (maybe 5 with larger items I have ordered) when it come to free shipping.  This did take exceptionally longer at 11 days from the time of the order to delivery but all in all I cannot complain too much.  Best buy has this TV at $1599 in ATL then you add on tax.  For me this was the best deal for a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: TS Francis "tottally rad"
Reviews.Content: The product exceeded my expectations. Ordered from Amazon, it came fast. Easy to set-up. Great picture. I even set it up to use an antena and it was great

Reviews.Title: This is a AWESOME HDTV!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony and Julie "Tony and Julie"
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying I did a TON of research before purchasing this HDTV. I am very anal retentive when it comes to buying any high priced electronic item. I like to make absolutely sure I am getting the best value for my dollar. I was REALLY, REALLY nervous buying this TV from Amazon especially because of their TV return policy. Being such a high ticket item scared me buying it sight unseen, but all the worry was for nothing as I received the TV without any problems what so ever. All that being said, I will now say that if you are looking for a 32" LCD HDTV then this is the one for you! The 4000:1 contrast ratio is eye-popping and the two HDMI hookups make all digital hook ups a breeze. I play my XBOX 360 on this and it makes it so much more enjoyable. It looks so good with so much detail I never noticed on other TV sets. I want to also say that analog signals do not look very good on this TV, but then again I don't think they look good on any LCD/Plasma. If you have Dish Network like I do or some other all digital HD signal then you are in for a real treat. I can not stop watching the Dish Network broadcasts in HD. It is truly amazing. I am so spoiled to HD now that I will never be able to go back to regular TV. I highly recommend you buy this TV!!

Reviews.Title: I had no idea!
Reviews.Author: Donavan Byrn
Reviews.Content: The image on the web just doesn't do justice to this thing! It's beautiful and the picture is amazing and it pretty much set itself up.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable tv - ours broke twice in 7 months - horrid customer service
Reviews.Author: S. Gore
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv (Samsung LNS3251) in August 2006; less than 2 days after we bought it, the sound broke. It was repaired within a week fortunately. Five and a half weeks ago it broke again - the picture is gone. After about 3-4 weeks of battling with repairmen and customer service, they determined the tv was a lemon and have finally offered to replace it. But with a much lesser model and not a full warranty - just the remaining time on our original warranty. This is outrageous and such a poor example of customer service. Samsung should be ashamed of themselves for such flagrant poor service - not to mention the poor performance of the tv. Good luck with this if you don't mind risking a so-called lemon.

Reviews.Title: I'm very glad I bought it, i bring it to latin america
Reviews.Author: Raul Licausi
Reviews.Content: I bring it from Miami to latin america, and because is not heavy at all i didnt have any problems to check it as my bagagge. I only pay extra 25$ in american airlines.  Im very happy with the performance and I hope i dont have any problems in the near future.  Very nice shape.i bought after a long research, and i m very happy of chosing this one.

Reviews.Title: A Great TV overall
Reviews.Author: Tuan A. Pham
Reviews.Content: I was leaning toward the LNS3238 sold at Walmart for $900 (plus 7% tax = 963) at first, but found the LNS3251 on Amazon (sold by Amazon for $1030, no tax, free shipping.) I called Samsung to get comparision info between the two. The LNS3251 has 4000:1 contrast ratio and a couple more inputs such as for Ipod, etc while the LNS3238 has 3000:1 contrast ratio. I was still reluctlant to buy a big ticket and delicate item online, but decided to give it a try after reading the reviews here, and I am glad I did. I ordered it on 1/17/07 and Eagle delivered it yesterday. Reading the reviews here, I expected Eagle to open the box and set it up for me, but they did not. I did not really mind since it was such a minor task. However I would still rather have them open the box in case of any damage.  My review would be similar to most of the reviews here: great picture but audio could be better. Overall, it is a great TV for the price.CON: This TV generates quite a bit of heat for a LCD TV. On a side note, I bought a 40" Sony LCD TV 6 months ago. At that time, I really liked the Samsung 42" plasma but it generated too much heat. I could not place my hand on its screen for more than a few seconds. It was that hot. TV's from other brands did not feel that hot compared to the Samsung. That's why I decided to buy a LCD instead of a plasma at that time. Now, this 32" Samsung LCD seems to generate more heat than its LCD competitors also.Remember to register your product online within 10 days of purchase. Samsung will give you free 3-month warranty extension

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D 32" Wide LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: P. Franks
Reviews.Content: Terrific service - the TV arrived quickly and in great condition. The picture is sharp. We're very happy with our purchase and would purchase again from this vendodr.

Reviews.Title: Ok but has problems with picture distortion and grayed out functions
Reviews.Author: Fletch
Reviews.Content: My parents bought this tv about a year ago when it was $1500.00. The tv may be ok for the money now, but it sure was not worth what they paid and my mother has said several times they wish they had not bought it. The biggest issue is distortion at 16:4 of objects. They appear too wide and there is NO adjustment for this (according to the manual) which is crazy for a tv that cost this much. The other problem that won't bother too many people is  a missing feature for pc input. The manual claims this model has this feature yet the menu will not allow you to select it as a source (with or without a pc connected). It is grayed out and if you look at Samsung's website you will see this is a common complaint that is mentioned in the faq yet no mention on how to actually solve it. Probably just a software bug as the tv has the vga connector but they should not have released the tv until these issues were resolved. Hopefully newer models have these problems corrected but stay away unless you get it really cheap.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but not great sound
Reviews.Author: PedsICU RN
Reviews.Content: We purchased this T.V. and placed it in our media armoire.  The picture is great but we find it is very hard to hear.  I don't know if this has to do with the tv being in a cabinet and the placement of the speakers on the TV or if it is just the TV.  Even with the volume high we often miss words or sentences if there is any other ambient noise in the room.  It also seems to lag when the power button is pushed to turn it on.  Sometimes the lag is so long you push the power button again and end up in a cycle of turning it off/on.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" Review
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Great set.If you are patient this is the way to get a great set.  The Eagle delivery service takes several weeks and the tracking is very spotty.  Once the set arrives, it has a great picture, ok sound using the built in speakers.  This set is selling for about 30% more at local retailers and was well worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
