Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Picture quality is excellent.  Sound quality is solid.  Plays all formats including 720p and 1080i but not 1080p. I did a lot of research on TV's and I believe this one is the best.I hooked up my PS2 with component cables and it looks so clear.Eagle shipping was a little slow, but they came when they said they would.

Reviews.Title: Very Sleek.
Reviews.Author: Peter Schuft
Reviews.Content: Great picture, good looking product.  No downside for me.  Looks really good with xbox 360.  HD tuner is a great perk.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD  at a great price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Shipping from Amazon was slow.  They said by the 5th at the latest and ended up getting it by the twelfth.  Do not get stuck with that Amazon Prime offer, they wouldn't honor it for this TV.However, once I finally got the TV, it was easy to set up and looks great.  I bought it to use with the xbox 360 I recently purchased.  I've heard all about how lcds are no good for video games becasue of frame rate, etc.  But I saw this model in some stores, at much higher prices, and was impressed by the picture and the online reviews.The picture is great.  Great blacks tones and contrasts.  No ded pixels, thank goodness.  Images and gameplay for the xbox 360 look great.  I heard a lot about blurring of images on LCDs, but didn't find it that noticable.  I am very satisfied.  I probably could have gone with a smaller display, but I guess I can manage.I hooked up standard cable to the back.  Picture is good, but since it's not in digital it doesn't measure up to this units potential.Excellent bargain for the price.  I looked in several stores, and all over online, and in my opinion for an LCD of this size, this is the one to get.  I would have paid a few hundred more if I had too.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D - Awesome
Reviews.Author: BigRed
Reviews.Content: OK, I have always loved Sony tvs.  I have a 55" rptv as my primary tv.  It is very nice and still has a better picture than this Samsung.  However, I was not buying the Samsung as a replacement;  I was buying it as a gaming tv, compter monitor, and secondary tv to tinker with Vista, Linux, MythTV.I bought this to replace a Philips 32" that was just poor in comparison.  I have my XBox 360 hooked up and cable without a STB.  SD channels are OK, better than expected.  HD content is incredible.  The 4000:1 contrast ratio makes blacks look very distinguishable.  Gears of War is insane looking on this LCD.  I watched LotR: FotR on it and had no issues with the dark scenes.  I also had no issues with high speed sports (Aussie Open, football, basketball).  The Philips had a heckuva time trying to play anything with lots of motions.So far I have no negatives.  I have not had any issues people are saying for long time before pictures come on.  I have timed it and in every instance, it is less than 10 seconds.  This is incredible.  If you think that is too long, then you are digging deep for something wrong.  It is possible others are having it take much longer, but not mine.There are many other 32" tvs out there, but all will sacrifice greatly in the features and performance department.  I recommend that you look at the return policies where you buy it and LCD.  The cheaper TVs (Olevia, Polaroid, Toshiba, etc) may not perform as well as you need.  It is possible that this one will not.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, shipping not that long
Reviews.Author: ArmyVolunteerGermany "ArmyfamilyinGermany"
Reviews.Content: The box arrived in great shape and the set-up didn't take too long (~15 minutes).  It has a good look and fits nicely in our bedroom armoire.  The delay when turning it on is no problem however the noise it makes when you turn it on and off can be annoying, especially late at night.  If there is a way to turn this feature off, please let me know!Overall, great TV.

Reviews.Title: If you have your own universal remote, then this tv is superb
Reviews.Author: Ryan Davis "Ryan"
Reviews.Content: pros:- Sleek design accents any wall.- Colors are as natural as any set I've previewed at Best Buy.- You can leave it in 16:9 mode, and it will optimize the size of any program you watch.cons:- Remote design is a joke.  If the same guy designed your car you'd be adjusting side mirrors with the steering wheel.- The information boxes that pop up when you change something (channel, sleep, etc.) are way too small.  At 20-20 vision, I can barely read them at fifteen feet.- The sleep function gives no warning before it turns off your set.  I'm used to a three minute countdown on my old set.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Piano Finish and HDTV, Quick Shipping with Eagle
Reviews.Author: Hatch
Reviews.Content: My first HDTV purchase, and it was a good deal-Price was $979 + free shipping.  I shopped around-My choice was between this and the Sharp Aquos LC-32D40U.  The Sharp (1200:1 contrast ratio) was cheaper, but the 4000:1 contrast ratio, beautiful piano finish and styling of the Samsung was worth the extra few bucks.  I ordered on 12/27/06 and had estimated delivery date of 1/9/07-1/15/07.  I got it on Saturday 1/6/07 (I tracked the package to Newark, NJ on 1/3/07, and called the number listed on the Amazon site.  Eagle was ready to ship the next day, but I asked for Saturday 11am-3pm.  They delivered at 11:30am.  I bought a Black 2 Meter / 6 Ft. HDMI Male to DVI Male Cable on Amazon for $9 to hook up to my Time Warner HDTV cable box, and within minutes, I was watching crystal-clear HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: A. B. Hill
Reviews.Content: This LCD display is truly outstanding. After comparing this disply to several other32 inch diplays, I felt the Samsung had the best black level, most accurate colors, and the mostdetailed picture. As a bonus, the unit is beautiful to behold.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs up for Eagle
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Williams
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the reviews for Eagle I was concerned about getting my purchase on time. I ordered the tv on Dec.30th it was shipped (free) on the 2nd and I got it on the 5TH. As an earlier reviewer stated the key is to track your order and as soon as it arrives in your area and call them to arrange delivery.

Reviews.Title: picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Alvarez
Reviews.Content: great picture, great hd pictures, best tv brand in the market, we have two of then a 32 and a 46. Best money spend on tvs.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD TV
Reviews.Author: Cooper H. Baker "tech guru"
Reviews.Content: For a 32" LCD HD TV for under $1000, I can't imagine it gets any better than this.  Buy an HDMI cable (at Sam's Club for $20) and you're good to go.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: hi_octane
Reviews.Content: I had this LCD for about 4 week. The lcd has great picture quality sound is ok...I went LCD cause they save on space but like all LCD's black will never be black but get close and 8ms may be "blazing fast" to some, but not me I see blurring from the responce time while watch normal tv/dvd and gaming ...Which lead me to believe there is not lcd out that dont have this problem. Which is the only down side to the LCD great picture but ghosting is bad imoI seeing ghosing in 60 DLP sony but it no were as bad as this

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNS3251D LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: D. W. Bondurant
Reviews.Content: The equipment arrived on schedule and in good condition.  The picture quality of the Samsung LCD was worth the extra money.  I will use Amazon for future electronics purchases.

Reviews.Title: Choose the right size
Reviews.Author: S. Cox
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 3251 provides a great picture, but will benefit greatly when coupled with a home theater sound system. I wondered what size would be best for my family room and now wish that I had purchased a larger model. The 32 inch widescreen actually becomes a 27 inch size for programs that are not in high definition format. Until all programming is in high definition, it is going to feel a little small. I believe the 40 inch model would have been about the right size for my average-sized family room. With that said, I am very satisfied with the picture quality, variety of inputs, and the appearance of the television. The speakers do not deliver the same quality experience, and I highly recommend running the audio through a surround sound system with an optical cable. There is definitely a pleasing difference in high definition, and even though programming is lacking, it is now sufficient to make the purchase worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: A great buy!
Reviews.Author: Herbert Leshay
Reviews.Content: Great job Amazon. Ordered the Samsung 32" LN-S3251D at just over $1,000. Delivery was supposed to be between Dec. 5 - 11th. The set was received on December 1st!. After all I had heard about EGL' s delivery problems, they were terrific.  The TV is all we expected. The Samsung offers the best picture for the buck of any of the other LCD's.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY SAMSUNG TV
Reviews.Author: KELL95 "KELL95"
Reviews.Content: WE BOUGHT A FLAT SCREEN LCD 1.5 YEARS AGO AND THE PIXELS HAVE ALREADY STARTED TO DIE.  EVEN THOUGH IT IS A MANUFACTURE'S FLAW, SAMSUNG WILL NOT REPAIR THE DEFECT.  A ONE YEAR WARRANTY IS NOT ENOUGH.  WE DID NOT MISUSE OR DAMAGE THE SET BUT IT STILL STARTED TO DIE.

Reviews.Title: Great TV....
Reviews.Author: Tedford Clay "ECW"
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV and makes my Blu-Ray movies and PS3 gaming Console look so puuurttty...

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV!!!
Reviews.Author: I. Prado
Reviews.Content: I love this TV very much. Nothing beats the performance and price. But it would have been "excellent" if it was a 1080p hdtv.

Reviews.Title: WOW What a TV!
Reviews.Author: Rush
Reviews.Content: After spending 1 month doing research on HDTV! I went from a beginner plasma fan to a more expert and ended up buying an LCD tv! Let me tell you one thing LCD is far superior to plasma... hands DOWN! This tv is just spectacular... simple yet superior in its class! the best 32 inch flat panel around! if you need a LCD for a bedroom or even a living room this will be the one! With its perfect finish i dont think there is anything more i can ask!Thank you amazon for this wonderful tv!cheers!

Reviews.Title: Best 32 inch LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Bruce H. Gelman
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome, better picture than the Sony and cost a bit less.  I shopped at Best Buy and Circuit City, saved $400 at Amazon.Sound is not great, but I have it hooked up to surround sound.Football is incredible on this set.

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: David W. Hudson
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LNS3251D is a well made quality TV.  However if you are looking for that crystal clear picture don't expect it unless you are receiving HDTV and are using the HDMI connection (cable not included).  Aside from that I would recommend this TV and would look at Samsung first for my next purchase.

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: Joseph Murray "LILJOEY"
Reviews.Content: THE TV ARRIVED ON TIME AND IN GREAT CONDITION. VERY PLEASED WITH SERVICE AND PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN-S3251D LCD Television
Reviews.Author: A. Sargent
Reviews.Content: Purchased TV from Amazon about three months ago and am very satisfied.It was delivered on time as promised. The color is excellent and the sound is better than expected; I haven't bothered to connect it to the surround sound receiver as Samsung seems to have taken care of that for me.

Reviews.Title: For DVDS, Great. For average TV watching, bleeeccchhh!
Reviews.Author: Bradley F. Smith
Reviews.Content: Hooked up to digital cable, and watching the channels you watch the most, this TV delivers worse performance than my old picture tube Sony. That's what you don't quite realize amid all the hype about these pricey flat-screen models. About 95 percent of your viewing is going to be of broadcasts that look pretty lousy if you are an average cable-TV watcher.Hooked up to a good DVD player via HDMI, then you will see why these TVs make some people happy. The picture is fantastic. However, if you don't watch a lot of DVDs, then save your money and keep your old TV. Don't succumb to the advertising hype and peer pressure.I haven't tried watching HDTV via cable because I dont want to pay the cable company extra. I could hook it up to my own antenna, but then I'd have ugly wires running around. I'm told this works to receive the local channels in HD. I'll get around to it someday, maybe. I'm not a huge fan of network TV, so I'm in no rush.Also, the remote is pretty awful. Sluggish, just as everyone else notes. The TV takes forever to respond.All in all, if I knew then what I know now, I think I might have skipped buying this thing and stuck with my perfectly good CRT Sony which I bought just 4 years ago for $400.Until all TV is in HD, you might want to save your cash.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture quality with proper settings
Reviews.Author: J. Lauer
Reviews.Content: Already owned a 43" Pioneer plasma and bought this for a bedroom after reading reviews/bench tests by CNET and PC Magazine as well as owner reviews. Quick note about delivery as this has been a common thread in these reviews. Eagle shipping delivery was trouble free and within time stated. They called me as soon as TV arrived in their warehouse.Picture quality as with all HD TV's is highly dependant on getting the setting s right. In the case of this set, you need to experiment with:- Color Temp- Backlight setting (on remote)- Brightness- Color and contrast- Sharpness- ModeCNET testers came up with a list of recommended settings which I found to work well. I would however say that after watching my Pioneer Plasma set, this sets picture is definetly a level down in color saturation and overall visual impact.One note on stretching the picture for non HD broadcasts to fill the screen. The option to do this on screen (as has been noted previously) is not available through the on screen menu or TV remote. The remote that operates my cable HD box has a button that stretched the screen in various zooms. Try using your Cable remote if you are using a Cable HD box. Note that not all cable remotes have this feature either. On my Cablevision remote, the asterisk button performs this feature.

Reviews.Title: can't get enough of this TV
Reviews.Author: FabFlo "FFlo"
Reviews.Content: best TV i've ever owned. aweseome picture quality, sound, everything.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: mr. perfect
Reviews.Content: This TV is great with incredible picture and very good sound.  At first, I was a little nervous that it might be damaged during shipping, but by purchasing it through amazon I was saving $500.  Don't be afraid to ship it - the TV arrived in perfect condition and within the time promised.  And you can't beat free shipping.

Reviews.Title: black magic
Reviews.Author: Ronald Sandee "Ron"
Reviews.Content: Great design, nice sound and excellent picture quality. The only problem is that the screen went black within a month.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LCD
Reviews.Author: R. Waldman
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality picture.  Perfect size for living room.  Don't like the glossy black trim,, glares during daylight hours, otherwise, excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: Happy so far!......
Reviews.Author: G. W. Lucas
Reviews.Content: I ordered on Sept. 9th and was delivered on Sept. 18th.  Not bad for free shipping.  The Amazon projected delivery was Oct. 2.  I was happy to see it come early.I just picked up my hd cable box today so I have not tried hdtv yet.  I unpacked it last night and watching Monday Night football the picture was great.  NO DEAD PIXELS!Like others have said the sound is not very good. I listen through my stereo anyway so that is no big deal.I look forward to watching hdtv tonight.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Grujich "PGRUJICH"
Reviews.Content: TV ARRIVED SAFELY - PICTURE NOT AS CLEAR AS I WOULD LIKE BUT OTHERWISE IT IS A VERY NICE TELEVISION

Reviews.Title: Great price.. Careful handling and shipment .. A++
Reviews.Author: Sumit Sengupta
Reviews.Content: I researched on this product and fount this to be the lowest in price - other than some shady internet merchants. They took a while to ship this product but it came in nice box and it was delivered  inside home and they even opened it to ensure everything looked ok ( no physical damage )..

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: B. Dinan "On line shopping queen!"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a sleek, sophisticated appearance and the on screen pic is great.  Set up was a snap.Price on Amazon was super.Our only compliant is the sound it makes when it comes on in the morning.  We use the TV as our alarm clock and it has a relatively loud beep that it makes as it comes on.  Of course it does do the job and wakes us up....guess we shouldn't complain when it is doing its job!

Reviews.Title: 32 inch samsung LNS3251D
Reviews.Author: A. Padilla "booboo88"
Reviews.Content: I received this item on Jan. 18, 2007.  The t.v. was defective and only worked for a couple of hours.  It took a couple of weeks to receive this item.  I should say that amazon was real prompt in returning this item to them for a refund.  To say the least, I was very disappointed with the operation of the t.v. because I couldn't watch the NFL playoffs, the main reason why I bought it. I have since returned the item to Amazon, and went to Circuit City to buy a t.v.  I would really hesitate to make another purchase on amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Just an OK TV
Reviews.Author: L. Harrison "leezinho"
Reviews.Content: The TV picture is great but many of the other features of the TV are subpar.  The remote/TV combo is very sluggish--it often requires pushing a button on the remote multiple times to get the TV to respond.  Some of the features are also less than ideal--the minimum time for the sleep timer is 30 minutes (whereas many other TVs allow minimums of 10 or 15 minutes) and it takes navigating through a multitude of menus to do simple tasks, like setting the TV wake-up alarm or modifying its settings.  Surely Samsung designers could have done better!

Reviews.Title: Never received the product.
Reviews.Author: J. Dryden
Reviews.Content: Shipping via Eagle was a disaster. I purchased this TV on January 18th. The expected delivery was January 30th. I gave amazon a few extra days and called on February 5th to find out the status. They said they would look into the delivery. I received an email four-days later indicating the can't find the product. The only option I was given was to start over or obtain a refund. Worst customer service I've ever experienced.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: J. L. Miller
Reviews.Content: Our TV was delivered to our door in fast order.  I also kept track of it.  At first I thought we got a lemon. The picture was terrible.  I called my son-in-law and he said make sure you tighten your connections real good.  I quickly found out that I hadn't.  Now we are happy with a clear and beautiful  picture.  Takes a little time to turn on,  but picture is great.  TV also gets very dusty.  That is life around here. I would suggest that a 32" is small.  Be sure and measure diagonally.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, but..
Reviews.Author: Prak
Reviews.Content: I went to the store to purchase this. It looked great. However, I saw the Sharp Aquos 32D43U placed side by side at compusa and it looked fantastic. The picture looked slightly better and had the curvacious look. Ended up purchasing it. Its a very recent model, got  6000:1 contrast ratio and 6 ms refresh rate. Its not out in many retail stores as yet. Its available only in compusa and brandsmart. Check it out before you decide on this. You may end up buying the sharp :)

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG NEW TV ARRIVED COMPLETELY DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Gale Altslim "Ms. Medfree"
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Samsung TV through amazon to be sent to my daughter residing in washington d.c.  After several weeks, the TV arrived and she left it in the package until the cable tv man could come make the connection and help set it up.  He was present with unpacking and told her the TV was completely defective; no images could be viewed, only multiple colors appeared on screen.  I live outside the U.S. and told her to call Samsung and they told her they could only 'repair' it, not exchange for a new one.  I was indignant that I had to pay for a new (not used)TV that was defective and had to be repaired prior to even turning it on.  I tried amazon returns but the site is down.  I hope for a resolution because I am really upset that a new tv can be delivered completely defective, and i no longer want a samsung and expect a full refund and hope i don't have problems with amazon with this.  I will have to search for another manufacturer now.

Reviews.Title: Great Product at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Kian
Reviews.Content: Picture, sound, and look are fantastic. Works great with the home theater system.The only reason for giving it 4 is the shipping took too long. It was shipped 6 days after the order was placed and another 7 days to arrive.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE OF SAMSUNG SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jason S. Johnson "TechnoJunkie"
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes the best product for the lowest price point - period. HOWEVER - CAVEAT EMPTOR is a universal truth that should NEVER BE FORGOTTEN!I had issues with my Samsung HD tube TV (different model but this info is still applicable). I was a good little customer - going through the normal processes - but ended up without a TV for two one month periods at a time! I eventually escallated to Samsung corporate by looking up their NJ Offices and asking to speak to the VP of Marketing / Customer Service. I was routed to the specialized corporate customer care group and STILL got the run around. UNBELIEVEABLE is the only way to describe how INEPT their Service processes and groups are. They supposedly use the Six Sigma approach to quality... Reviews.Title: Excelente Opcion
Reviews.Author: Zoilo Santos
Reviews.Content: Estuve buscando por casi dos semanas un TV LCD de tamaño mediano y luego de ver una gran cantidad de ellos  llegué a la conclusion que este modelo es el que tiene mejor relacion precio valor para una TV de 32". Lo instalé en mi habitación de dormir y que puedo decirles: realmente fabuloso, luce espectacular, con colores e imagenes nitidas, sonido bueno y excelente acabado. Realmente me siento satisfecho con esta compra y recomiendo este producto 100%.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have QAM Tuner
Reviews.Author: R. Lin "bob_changus"
Reviews.Content: I regret buying this TV. It does not have a QAM tuner. A QAM tuner allows you to get a digital signal from your standard cable. Pay the basic from Comcast and you get HD without the hassle of installing an antenna. I would return it if I could, but purchased the TV about 4 months ago. Don't make the same mistake I did. Do your research.

Reviews.Title: shipping sucks
Reviews.Author: pcs "Pcs"
Reviews.Content: DOn't buy this tv from amazon if you want to actually receive it.  The shipping is awful - just go buy it locally or from a reliable online source.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV Beware - EXTREMELY slow shipping
Reviews.Author: Slim Pickins "Pasquale"
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound are AWESOME! Highly recommend this Samsung TV to anyone in the market for a QUALITY HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Slow Shipping on Free Ship
Reviews.Author: JB "JB"
Reviews.Content: This is not a product review, since I have not recieved the TV yet.I ordered this TV from Amazon on 9/8 and recieved notification that I had a scheduled delivery on 9/20-9/26. OK not to bad I can wait a little. This item was in their wareshouse, so a third party transaction should not be a problem.I recieved my "order shipped" today 9/12.  OK, 3 days to process it.Here's the issue, The scheduled delivery date is now 10/2 from Eagle Truckers. I have not talked to the shipper yet, but will tomorrow. If I had known that it would take close to a month to get the TV, I may not have ordered it from them. Prices are falling fast and I am not sure that it will be such a good deal by the time I get it.I will update this post as things change.Update.I talked to the shipper and now I am scheduled for delivery on 9/19, so maybe all is OK. I guess you can't go by the delivery dates quoted.Will update again when recieved.Update: 9/22/06Received TV on 9/19. No dead pixels. There is always a chance of buying something online and dealing with the return poilicy on over 27" TV's. Fortunately I have not had an issue yet. Don't look forward with having to deal with Samsung for service. I saved about $220 plus the sales tax from buying retail. So if your really price conscious, then you should take the chance. I know that if I had a problem with dead pixels or speakers not working, then I would have just took it back to the store.As far as what I ahve seen on the TV itself...It has excellent HDTV and DVD quality. I am hook up to HD cable box and get anywhere from 720p to 1080i on HD channels..amazing picture.Do not expect analog signals to look as good as a tube TV. Digital channels are just average. So it depends or your source input.I am having trouble using HDMI input, it can't find the signal. At this point I don't know if its my cable box, the HDMI cable or the TV. From what I have seen, there isn't much difference in quality vs component input anyway. The HDMI will be useful for the DVD upconverter I will be getting.Another reason I bought this was for PC input via VGA. It displays 1366 x 768, 1024 x 768 and 800 x 600. Only the highest resouliton keeps the aspect ratio correct, so make sure your graphics card does. I have a good card so mine does and I watch a DVD from the PC and it was beautiful.I am also using it as a monitor for the PC when siitng on a couch 10 feet away, with wireless keyboard and mouse. It a little strain on my eyesite, but I need glasses. For normal vision it is not an issue. You cannot use PIP between PC and component or HDMI inputs.Overall I am please with this purchase, but I have not has the issues that are mentioned elsewhere.Hope this helps.
